section.title: Overview
section.description: The Backup Database Dialog Box action displays the Backup Database dialog box. This is the same as selecting the Table/Sets tab of the Control Panel, then clicking Tools > Backup/Restore Database > Backup Database....

step.description: If you wish Alpha Anywhere to automatically close all open windows to ensure that all files are backed up, check the Close all open Windows before displaying the Backup Dialog box check box.
Optionally modify the default comment which describes the action.

section.description: If you wish to close the database after running the backup, you must make the following modifications to your action script.
